item.title: DialogueHandler.java rep++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:2, topic:423708”][quote author=liamp link=topic=526333.msg3833538#msg3833538 date=1322740078]
case 155:
sendNpcChat2(“Hello adventurer, my name is sir tiffy.”,“Where would you like to go?”, 2290, “Sir Tiffy”);
c.nextChat = 156;
break;
case 156:
c.getDH().sendOption4(“Edgeville”, “Al Kharid”, “Karamja”, “Mage Bank”);
c.usingGlory = true;
c.nextChat = 0;
break;
}
}

if i was to change the places edgeville and all that to something else if i did that were would i change the coords to were they teleport you?
[/quote]

Actionhandler[/quote]
thanks but what would i search to find the coords off the edgeville and stuff?

Read full topic
